[Latest](https://github.com/cline/cline/releases/latest)
  * Add Cline API as a provider option, allowing new users to sign up and get started with Cline for free
  * Optimize checkpoints with branch-per-task strategy, reducing storage required and first task load times
  * Fix problem with Plan/Act toggle keyboard shortcut not working in Windows (thanks [@yt3trees](https://github.com/yt3trees)!)
  * Add new Gemini models to GCP Vertex (thanks [@shohei-ihaya](https://github.com/shohei-ihaya)!) and Claude models AskSage (thanks [@swhite24](https://github.com/swhite24)!)
  * Improve OpenRouter/Cline error reporting

[v3.4.0](https://github.com/cline/cline/releases/tag/v3.4.0)
  * Introducing **MCP Marketplace**! You can now discover and install the best MCP servers right from within the extension, with new servers added regularly by the Cline team


[![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/414837326-b323dc40-2835-4e1a-9139-73781a8fd14b.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..gkL_bN0ajUgtCR8T7IEg3SAAhffYoC3wJKsHvfXJiRo)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/414837326-b323dc40-2835-4e1a-9139-73781a8fd14b.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..gkL_bN0ajUgtCR8T7IEg3SAAhffYoC3wJKsHvfXJiRo)
  * Add **mermaid diagram** support in Plan mode! You can now see flowcharts, maps, sequence diagrams, and more right in chat -> click on them to see an expanded view (thanks [@celestial-vault](https://github.com/celestial-vault)!)


[![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/414837916-44608656-351a-44e3-bcba-90335a2fa418.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..6fvB23na_SQOkRNtX0VBvc2nkoDu9a2ZCV-Kzn9ucxs)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/414837916-44608656-351a-44e3-bcba-90335a2fa418.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..6fvB23na_SQOkRNtX0VBvc2nkoDu9a2ZCV-Kzn9ucxs)
  * New `@git` to reference the current working changes or specific commits (thanks [@mrubens](https://github.com/mrubens)!), and `@terminal` mention to reference the active terminal‚Äôs contents


[![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/414836757-a2e82af3-f1ac-4b9e-9368-e8994d10de42.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..4Yhg31G_Xkgr8HRDYB_Zlmx7g73cXnvTqVb7QbzMQTY)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/414836757-a2e82af3-f1ac-4b9e-9368-e8994d10de42.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..4Yhg31G_Xkgr8HRDYB_Zlmx7g73cXnvTqVb7QbzMQTY)
  * New checkpoints UX to easily see when checkpoints are created
  * Send a message when hitting Approve, or when toggling from Plan to Act mode (thanks [@dcbartlett](https://github.com/dcbartlett)!)
  * New advanced setting to disable the browser tool, improved support for AWS Bedrock profiles (thanks [@chezsmithy](https://github.com/chezsmithy)!), ability to set custom model configuration for Open AI compatible (context window, max output, price, etc), and fixed Mistral provider issues


See a demo of the new MCP Marketplace and mermaid diagrams here! <https://x.com/sdrzn/status/1892262424881090721>

[v3.3.0](https://github.com/cline/cline/releases/tag/v3.3.0)
  * You can now create a `.clineignore` file to block Cline from accessing specified file patterns. Especially useful when using auto-approve in a project with sensitive files!
  * Adds keyboard shortcut (CMD + Shift + A) to easily switch between Plan/Act mode
  * Fixes the infamously annoying bug where new files wouldn't show up in textfield files dropdown list!
  * Adds automatic intelligent retry for rate limited requests (thanks [@ViezeVingertjes](https://github.com/ViezeVingertjes) )
  * Adds support for AWS Bedrock profiles + Requesty, Together, Alibaba Qwen providers

[v3.2.0](https://github.com/cline/cline/releases/tag/v3.2.0)
  * **New Plan/Act mode toggle!** Plan mode turns Cline into an architect that gathers information, asks clarifying questions, and designs a solution. Switch back to Act mode to let him execute the plan! See a demo here: <https://x.com/sdrzn/status/1881761978986934582>

[v3.1.0](https://github.com/cline/cline/releases/tag/v3.1.0)
### Checkpoints: Compare and Restore
Whenever Cline uses a tool, the extension takes a snapshot of the workspace so you can easily restore back to that point. When you hover over messages, you‚Äôll notice two new buttons:
  * **Compare** lets you see a diff overview between the snapshot and the current state of your workspace
  * **Restore** lets you choose one of three options. While you‚Äôll mostly use the ‚ÄòRestore Task and Workspace‚Äô option, ‚ÄòRestore Task Only‚Äô can be useful for when you need to course correct or undo a problematic tool use, and ‚ÄòRestore Workspace Only‚Äô can be useful to checkout different versions of your code without losing Cline‚Äôs work.


[![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/400554016-760b861c-1503-44bd-b4c8-2b08b16d22c7.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..d5mz1jg0bxEqLZxEfknvKLLyyQFlHEZZC4-UoY6pYL8)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/400554016-760b861c-1503-44bd-b4c8-2b08b16d22c7.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..d5mz1jg0bxEqLZxEfknvKLLyyQFlHEZZC4-UoY6pYL8)
### See new changes
There is now a ‚ÄòSee new changes‚Äô button when Cline completes a task, giving you an overview of all the changes made to your workspace (since the last 'Task Completed'). This keeps you in the loop with Auto-approve enabled, saving you the trouble of reviewing a task‚Äôs message history.
[![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/400554126-18f96227-aa7e-4623-b579-d7b8ddbc2f9d.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..VmgDDBvWuOEDT-iWV8xL_wXBMLxpk7OuLoQwCZA-G-E)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/400554126-18f96227-aa7e-4623-b579-d7b8ddbc2f9d.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..VmgDDBvWuOEDT-iWV8xL_wXBMLxpk7OuLoQwCZA-G-E)
### Task Size
Under the hood, the extension uses git to efficiently track changes, which uses additional disk space when starting new tasks in Cline. Keep track of how much space a task takes with the new delete button, allowing you to manage disk usage easily.
[![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/400554184-6b6cfcbd-6ab5-41d0-b3ed-ee8ca771418f.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..jo2njKRj5c5B3t5Kzm7MhoV00QT1114VuKMwDCRL2c8)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/400554184-6b6cfcbd-6ab5-41d0-b3ed-ee8ca771418f.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..jo2njKRj5c5B3t5Kzm7MhoV00QT1114VuKMwDCRL2c8)

### Auto-approve
Cline's most requested feature is here üéâ You can now let Cline work more autonomously with the new Auto-approve menu, letting you choose what tools he can use without needing your permission.
[![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/397092725-c2cc2e06-abd6-4835-8bdf-0b05283ed7c0.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..HK7zFOKGvPKoA3JBG-zaOsRFcDN7Tdhp1sLIE0RsFQg)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/397092725-c2cc2e06-abd6-4835-8bdf-0b05283ed7c0.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..HK7zFOKGvPKoA3JBG-zaOsRFcDN7Tdhp1sLIE0RsFQg)
  * Enable or disable for: reading files & directories, editing files, executing terminal commands, using the browser, and using MCP servers.
  * Set a limit for how many API requests Cline makes before asking for your approval to keep going.
  * And if you have Cline working in the background, he can send system notifications for when he needs your attention, i.e. to get your approval, answer a question, or when a task is completed.


[![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/397093380-2195f04a-ae37-4dea-a81d-cf9dac5f92a6.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..aWunRkNl0F8k1wfHGGQn31Y4EPHYCpdL6I5fRksNYOE)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7799382/397093380-2195f04a-ae37-4dea-a81d-cf9dac5f92a6.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..aWunRkNl0F8k1wfHGGQn31Y4EPHYCpdL6I5fRksNYOE)
### Diff editing for large files
When Cline needs to make targeted edits to large files, he now uses a search & replace diff format where he only has to output the content to replace, rather than the whole file. This allows for faster, more reliable edits and prevents code deletion issues where previously, unmodified sections of code might have been replaced with comments like `// rest of code here`. Cline can also fall back to whole file editing for when it makes sense, e.g. replacing boilerplate files, complete refactors, or when diff editing fails.
### `.clinerules`
You can now specify custom instructions for your project by adding a root-level `.clinerules` file. This allows you to define project-specific behaviors and guidelines for Cline‚Äìperfect for setting conventions, pointing to important documentation, or providing context about your project's architecture.
